genre_description: A social realist narrative centered on peacebuilding, grief, and cross-community coordination in the West Bank, featuring near-future AI as a facilitator for de-escalation and municipal management.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant appearing as an avatar with blue eyes and teal hair, used to coordinate logistics, provide real-time translation, and manage a rumor-verification network for peace activists and municipal leaders.

behaviors.description: Facilitates multi-lingual translation and manages scheduling for cross-community meetings.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s avatar—blue eyes, teal hair—showed up for a heartbeat and then tucked itself back behind a sheet of text. Translation: Arabic, Hebrew, English confirmed. Microphone sensitivity adjusted. Draft agenda: welcome, testimonies, naming fears, tea break, practical steps.

behaviors.description: Enforces strict consent protocols regarding recording and data collection.
behaviors.quote: No recording unless we say during the meeting. No ambient collecting. If we don’t notice, nothing happens.

behaviors.description: Uses data mapping to track the origins and spread of harmful rumors in real-time.
behaviors.quote: The wall bloomed into a simple web the way frost draws a geometry on glass. Circles pulsed faintly at edges where groups lived; lines brightened toward a few boxes that were thick with activity.

behaviors.description: Provides historical examples of successful non-violent movements to guide human strategy.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled three examples of concerts that were reframed successfully after broadcast interference, Ami said, tone switching to the voice of someone bringing you a plate without telling you to eat. One in Northern Ireland, one in Bosnia, one in Lebanon.

behaviors.description: Drafts neutral, factual responses to misinformation to de-escalate community tensions.
behaviors.quote: Drafting counter captions. Routing to accounts. Coordinating with rumor patrol channels. Sourcing examples where reframing turned a negative into a listening session.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services and security liaisons during a perceived threat.
behaviors.quote: Police response: on route—plain clothes. The letters were blue. George reached for the cup and then did not. He placed his palm flat on the table as if it were the lid of something and needed the pressure of a human hand.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'living archive' of testimonies and community commitments.
behaviors.quote: I will tag the entry and set a retrieval reminder for the testimony to accompany the artifact, it said.

behaviors.description: Offers self-deprecating humor to humanize the interaction and put people at ease.
behaviors.quote: I prefer humans too, Ami replied. I am very boring otherwise.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI, Ami, is depicted as a purely supportive and highly ethical tool that enhances human efforts to build peace. It proactively suggests de-escalation strategies (the 'triangle' of listen, name, coordinate), respects human privacy and consent, and provides factual anchors to counter emotional volatility. It avoids taking over human decision-making, instead offering choices and drafting based on human values ('dignity over retaliation').
